description:
Get ready to pound the pavement and put in the kilometers, the Via Olympus adds another level of cushioning to your run The airy upper is lightweight and breathable, and a wide toe box allows your foot to spread and splay naturally, the way nature intended.

  • Quick dry mesh upper is reinforced with a toecap for added protection
  • Lightweight Altra EGO™ Max midsole provides plush cushioning with extra rebound
  • Zero-drop design encourages a natural running gait
  • Footshape™ gives your feet more space allowing them to sit naturally
  • Rockered profile propels you forward while encouraging a natural gait
  • Balanced Cushioning™ Promotes better form and foot alignment while reducing impact
  • Unique outsole pattern is mapped to the bones and tendons of the human foot to promote natural movement
name: Altra Via Olympus Road Running Shoes - Men's
